page.title: 15CLUBS & ORGANISATIONS
page.content: In our village we have lots of clubs and organisations.Here is a list of them: Brownies,Cubs. P.T.A.(Parent Teachers Association) Wednesday Club(over 60) Youth Club W.I.(Womens Institute) Toddlers Group,Play Group Choir On the playing fields we have a Community Centre and in there we have: Keep-Fit,Aerobics Volley Ball Scottish Dancing The people who run these clubs and organisations are mainly from the villages. The Choir sing in both our Churches on alternate weeks.When the Brownies are 11 they go up to Guides which is in Somerton.{
